Required Minimum Distributions begin at age 73 (75 starting 2033) for Traditional IRA, 401k, 403b. Calculated: account balance / life expectancy factor. Penalty: 25% of missed amount (reduced from 50%). Roth IRAs have no RMDs. Inherited IRAs now follow 10-year rule for most non-spouse beneficiaries.
